The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 27 June is 43,909 (5,060.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 June, there were 613 new confirmed cases (70.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 June, there were 366 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 67% (247 extra cases).
